column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////Maybe I am just not a deep dish gal. My friend and I ordered a small to share. It was just very sloppy
column2: cheesy and not as hot as it should be for pizza. The mozzarella cheese got hard pretty quickly. We ended up not eating a lot of the crust. I still prefer thin crust. If deep dish
column3: then Zachary still does it well.
